'''v0.7.0 alpha''' is a major update to ''[[Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' that was released on June 5, 2013.<ref name=tweet/> It adds notable features such as [[Realms|Pocket Edition Realms]], [[bucket]]s, [[cake]]s and [[spawn egg]]s, as well as other changes and fixes.

|Cake
|Bucket
|Water Bucket
|Lava Bucket

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Cake JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cake]]s'''
* A food block that can be eaten by the player.
* Can be crafted with three milk buckets, two [[sugar]], one [[egg]], and three [[wheat]].

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bucket]]s'''
* Can be crafted with iron ingots.
* Are used to carry water, lava, or milk.
'''[[File:Water Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Water bucket]]'''
* Places [[water]].
'''[[File:Lava Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Lava bucket]]'''
* Places [[lava]].
'''[[File:Milk Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Milk bucket]]'''
* Can be only obtained by using a bucket on a [[cow]].
* Are used to craft cakes.
'''[[Spawn egg]]s'''
* Are used to spawn mobs directly.
* Cannot be obtained in Survival mode.
* Four type of spawn eggs, each spawning their respective mob:
** [[File:Chicken Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Spawn Egg|Chicken]]
** [[File:Sheep Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Spawn Egg|Sheep]] 
** [[File:Pig Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Spawn Egg|Pig]] 
** [[File:Cow Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Spawn Egg|Cow]]
'''[[File:Saddle JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Saddle]]s'''
* Currently serve no purpose.
* Are not yet obtainable.

=== General ===

'''[[Realms|Pocket Realms (alpha stage)]]'''
* An official subscription-based [[server]] hosting service that allows players to create and manage their own private ''Minecraft'' servers.
* World creation enabled from June 10 onwards.<ref>{{tweet|danfrisk|342405432104591360|Minecraft PE has support for Realms but it's disabled until Monday. The client doesn't show that so it's very confusing, sorry...|5 Jun 2013}}</ref>
* Not available on iOS devices.
'''[[Chat]]'''
* Players can press the [[File:Chat button BE1.png|25px]] button at the top-right of the screen to open the chat and talk with other players.
'''[[Light#Smooth lighting|Smooth lighting]]'''
* Blends light levels across block faces and darkens corners using {{w|ambient occlusion}} to add semi-realistic shadows and glowing from light sources.
* Can be toggled off in the options.
'''[[Settings]]'''
* D-pad size
** Controls the size of the directional buttons as well as circle that appears when destroying blocks.
** Is a slider that is set all the way right by default.
* View distance
** Changes the render distance of the terrain.
** Is currently limited to a slider with two settings.
** The leftmost setting sets the render distance to two [[chunks]], and the default rightmost setting sets it to four chunks.
* Beautiful skies
** Toggles clouds and sky color.
** Is on by default.
* Animated water
** Toggles water, lava, and fire animations.
** Is on by default.
* Smooth lighting
** Toggles smooth lighting.
** Is on by default.
* Hide GUI
** Makes the [[heads-up display]] invisible when toggled on.
** Is off by default.

== Changes ==

=== Blocks ===
'''[[Lava]]'''
* Now lights flammable blocks around it on fire.
* Now has a flowing animation.
** Texture has been changed from [[File:Lava BE1.png|32px]] to [[File:Lava JE12.png|32px]]. <!-- this is the correct render, image needs to be renamed -->

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Flint and Steel JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Flint and steel]]'''
* Can now be used to set fires.
'''[[File:Egg JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Egg]]s'''
* Are now used to craft cakes.
* Throwing an egg has a chance of spawning an adult chicken.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Chicken JE1 BE1.png|38px]] [[Chicken]]s'''
* Adult chickens now lay [[egg]]s and have a 1 in 8 chance to spawn a baby chicken and a 1 in 254 chance for an egg to hatch 4 chickens.
=== General ===
[[File:TitleBG.png|thumb|New main menu background.]]
'''[[Main menu]]'''
* The background is now a blurred image of a ''Minecraft'' world instead of a dirt background.
* The version number and Mojang copyright are both now in the bottom-left instead of the top and the bottom-right respectively.
* The ''Join Game'' button has been removed.
* The options button has been moved to the bottom-right.
* The ''Start Game'' button has been renamed to the ''Play'' button.
* Added the ''Play on Realms'' button in the middle.
* Xperia Play variant removed.
* Can be navigated with the D-pad on Xperia Play.
'''Select world menu'''
* Redesigned.
* Xperia Play variant removed.
* Cannot be navigated with the Xperia Play controller.
'''Create world menu'''
* Redesigned.
* Xperia Play variant removed.
* Can be partially navigated with the D-pad on Xperia Play.
'''[[Pause menu]]'''
* Server visibility, sound, and third person view are no longer directly controlled from it.
* An ''Options'' button has been added to it.
* Cannot be navigated with the Xperia Play controller.
'''[[Settings]]'''
* Replaced Android GUI with one rendered in game.
* Now uses [[options.txt]] to store settings.
* Removed the ''Lower graphics quality'' toggle.
* Is now split into four subsections, with some of them being split into further subsections:
** ''Game''
*** ''Name''
*** ''Difficulty''
*** ''Third person view''
*** ''Local server multiplayer''
** ''Controls''
*** ''Sensitivity''
*** ''Invert Y-Axis''
*** ''Lefty''
*** ''Play with touch''
*** ''Split controls''
*** ''D-Pad size''
*** ''Feedback'':
**** ''Destroy block (vibrate)''
** ''Graphics''
*** ''View Distance''
*** ''Fancy Graphics''
*** ''Beautiful skies''
*** ''Animated water''
*** ''Experimental'':
**** ''Smooth lighting''
**** ''Hide GUI''
** ''Sound''
*** ''Sound Volume''
* Not all options are available on all devices.
* Cannot be navigated with the Xperia Play controller.
'''[[Inventory]]'''
* Connecting players inventory is now saved on server.
* [[Creative inventory]]
